author: nicolaken
msg: Ignore jars placed here as they are local only.

author: nicolaken
msg: Added new 'tigris-style' skin, by using exactly the same
skin version 1.1. from the project Style at http://style.tigris.org/.
This will completely replace the avalon-tigris skin in subsequent versions.

author: nicolaken
msg: Fix what remained to be fixed.
- tables now render with the correct style
- the document font is now of
- removes font sizing javascript as it doesn't work on this skin
as it doesn't use relative values but "small" or "xx-small" that
can be still scaled but with the browser controls
- moved the search bar only on the left navigation
- moved round the breadcrumbs to make space for hierarchical tabs
- fixed the rendering of notes, warnings and fixmes

author: dims
msg: Fix for gump failure - add the correct name for the jar

author: nicolaken
msg: Extra CSS needed to make this skin work in 'quirks' mode, as
happens with the DTD we are using.
